Meta_Tags.title: Filo | Thank You
Meta_Tags.description:
Filo s.r.l. is an Italian Company on the IoT field based in Rome, Italy.
We program, develop, build and sell products that helps people in their daily life hobbies.

step_1: An email receipt including the details about your order has been sent to the email address provided.
step_2: As soon as your order will be processed and sent to the courier service, you will be notify with another email with the tracking number of your order.
for_info: Contact us here for any additional information or for reporting problems.
